TopicTitle: [1.0.4] RCS blocks firing in only one direction

Articles.Content:
I realised that since a few days, my RCS blocks fire only in one direction.
Other than that RCS works fine, as intended, especially for the Place Anywhere RCS Port with no problem whatsoever.
This issue occurs with all RCS blocks: stock and modded (I'm using Ven's Stock Revamp, but I don't think it changes RCS behaviour), so I thought that the issue might be linked to Real Fuels or some RCSFX stuff, but I haven't touched anything linked to RCS on my RF install recently.

My modlist is available here. Playing KSP 1.0.4 32bit on Windows.

Any help or advices from people who already encountered this issue or know how to solve it are appreciated!

 

Edited December 16, 2015 by Gaarst
Known bug in 1.0.4. Replace all MODULE of type ModuleRCS with ModuleRCSFX from the mod of that name.
The mods you're using, are they all build for 1.0.4 or are they 1.0.5? Using mods on a different build than they were designed for can cause weird things to happen.

2 minutes ago, NathanKell said:

Known bug in 1.0.4. Replace all MODULE of type ModuleRCS with ModuleRCSFX from the mod of that name.

Thank you, I will try it.

Any reason why it appeared all of a sudden ?

@Tex_NL, all my mods the latest releases for 1.0.4.

Edited December 16, 2015 by Gaarst
No idea why it just appeared, I saw it since 1.0.4 was in experimentals.
